title: Hailey Bieber Braves the NYC Heat in Trendy Polka Dot Capris
description: Hailey Bieber is not letting the New York City heatwave interrupt her streak of great looks. On Saturday, the Rhode founder made her way to a solo lunch date at Bar Pitti in Soho wearing a very Italian Riviera vacation-coded outfit.Â  Skin-tight white capris with oversized black polka dots by ...Continue reading
author: Brooke Frischer
